00022 /* Bulk In/Out Buffer */
00023 BYTE  BulkBuf[MAX_PACKET];
00024 BYTE  BulkLen;
00025 BYTE  BufferMemory[512];
00026 BYTE  MemoryLen = 0;
00027 
00028 /* LCD Buffer */
00029 unsigned char LCD_Buffer[17];
00030 
00031 /* LED Array */
00032 BYTE LED_status;
00033 
00034 /* Song Data */
00035 extern int iSongSize[3];
00036 extern unsigned char song_custom[256];
00037 
00038 /* DAC Volume */
00039 extern int volume;
00040 
00041 void Bulk2Out(void)
00042 {
00043         BulkLen = USB_ReadEP(BULK_EP_OUT, BulkBuf);
00044 
00045         memcpy(BufferMemory + MemoryLen, BulkBuf, BulkLen);
00046         MemoryLen += BulkLen;
00047 
00048 }
00049 
00050 //Successful transfer
00051 void Bulk2In(void)
00052 {       
00053         BulkBuf[0] = 1;
00054         BulkBuf[1] = 2;
00055         BulkBuf[2] = 3;
00056         BulkLen = 3;
00057         USB_WriteEP(BULK_EP_IN, BulkBuf, 3);
00058 }
00059 
00060 void LCD_print()
00061 {
00062         memset(LCD_Buffer, 0, 17);
00063         memcpy(LCD_Buffer, BufferMemory, 16);
00064         LCD_Buffer[16]= 0;
00065         lcd_print(LCD_Buffer);
00066 
00067         memset(LCD_Buffer, 0, 17);
00068         memcpy(LCD_Buffer, BufferMemory + 16, 16);
00069         LCD_Buffer[16]= 0;
00070         set_cursor(0, 1);
00071         lcd_print(LCD_Buffer);
00072 }

00074 /*      Processing Vendor control 
00075  *                       + Input: USB_SETUP_PACKET pointer
00076  *                       + Output: FALSE: fail transfer
00077  *                                       TRUE: success transfer 
00078  */
00079 
00080 BOOL VendorSetupStage(USB_SETUP_PACKET *p)
00081 {
00082 
00083  //  PLog("Vendor Setup Stage");
00084         switch(p->bRequest)
00085         {
00086                 case VC_SET_LIGHT_BAR:
00087                         break;
00088 
00089                 case VC_GET_LIGHT_BAR:
00090                         EP0Data.pData[0] = FIO2PIN;
00091                         EP0Data.Count = 1;
00092                         USB_DataInStage();                  
00093                         break;
00094 
00095                 case VC_LCD_CLEAR:
00096                         lcd_clear();
00097                         USB_StatusInStage();
00098                         break;
00099                 
00100                 case VC_LCD_SET_TEXT:
00101                         lcd_clear();
00102                         break;
00103 
00104                 case VC_LCD_SET_TEXT_NO_DATA:
00105                         USB_StatusInStage();
00106                         lcd_clear();
00107                         LCD_print();
00108                         MemoryLen = 0;
00109                         break;
00110                 
00111                 case VC_DAC_MUSIC1:
00112                         NhacOn(0);
00113                         USB_StatusInStage();
00114                         break;
00115                 
00116                 case VC_DAC_MUSIC2:
00117                         NhacOn(1);
00118                         USB_StatusInStage();        
00119                         break;
00120 
00121                 case VC_DAC_MUSIC_BY_DATA:
00122                         USB_StatusInStage();
00123                         NhacCustom(BufferMemory, MemoryLen);
00124                         MemoryLen = 0;
00125                         break;
00126                 
00127                 case VC_DAC_STOP_MUSIC:
00128                         NhacOff();
00129                         USB_StatusInStage();      
00130                         break;
00131 
00132                 case VC_DAC_SET_VOLUME:
00133                         volume = p->wValue.WB.L;          
00134                         break;
00135           
00136                 default:
00137                         return (FALSE);
00138         }
00139 
00140         return (TRUE);
00141 }
00142 
00143 void VendorDataStage(USB_SETUP_PACKET *p)
00144 {
00145         switch(p->bRequest)
00146         {
00147                 case VC_SET_LIGHT_BAR:
00148                     USB_StatusInStage();
00149                         LED_status = p->wValue.WB.L;
00150                         //LED_status = EP0Data.pData[0];
00151                 //      PLog("Set LED Datastage");
00152                     FIO2CLR = 0xFF;
00153                         FIO2SET = LED_status;
00154                         
00155                         break;
00156 
00157                 case VC_LCD_SET_TEXT:
00158                         USB_StatusInStage();
00159                         BulkLen = p->wLength;
00160                         LCD_print();
00161                         break;
00162 
00163                 case VC_DAC_SET_VOLUME:
00164                         USB_StatusInStage();
00165                         PLogN("EP0Data.pData[0]: ");
00166                         PLogNum(EP0Data.pData[0]);
00167                         PLog("");       
00168                         PLogN("volume: ");
00169                         PLogNum(volume);          
00170                         break;
00171 
00172                 default:
00173                         break;
00174         }
00175 }
